Àtụ:Infobox country at games
South Sudan sonyere na 2020 Summer Olympics na Tokyo

N'ịbụ nke e mere atụmatụ na mbụ ka ọ ga-ewere ọnọdụ site na 24 Julaị ruo 9 Ọgọst 2020, e yigharịrị egwuregwu ahụ ruo 23 Julaị gaa na 8 Ọgọust 2021, n'ihi ọrịa COVID-19. Nke a bụ nke abụọ mba ahụ pụtara na Summer Olympics, kemgbe ọ malitere na 2016.
Ihe na-esonụ bụ ndepụta nke ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị na-asọmpi na egwuregwu ahụ.
South Sudan natara oghere universality site na World Athletics iji zipu ndị na-eme egwuregwu abụọ (otu n'ime okike ọ bụla) na Olimpik.Àtụ:Smalldiv
